fixed_skill.desc: Restore 1 ally's HP by 35.6/37.4/39.2% of Attack + 1077/1333/1608.
fixed_skill.name: Diarama

innate_skill.desc: 21.8/22.9/24.0% chance to inflict Sleep on all foes for 2 turns.
innate_skill.name: Lullaby

innate_skill.desc: Cure Burn, Freeze, Shock, or Windswept on 1 ally.
innate_skill.name: Baisudi

passive_skill.desc: Increase healing effect by 8%. If an ally is below 50% HP, increase healing effect by 20%.
passive_skill.name: Goddess of Fate

passive_skill.desc: Increase healing effect by 8%. If an ally is below 50% HP, increase healing effect by 23%.
passive_skill.name: Goddess of Fate I

passive_skill.desc: Increase healing effect by 8%. If an ally is below 50% HP, increase healing effect by 26%.
passive_skill.name: Goddess of Fate II

showtime_skill.desc: Restore HP to party equal to 48.6%/52.0%/55.4% Attack + 1471/1854/2275.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
